name: Bot In Sec
desc: Powerful tool for programming telegram bots. Support send messages with interval or scheduled. Creating bots commands. And of course the automation of the native answers. With botinsec, you can create a bot even with minimal Python experience.

name: Thick Marker
desc: Application for cross-platform drawing from the browser. The peculiarity is that it makes the lines smoother and more natural.

name: Sticker Columns
desc: This is a sticker board. Here is a list of columns, and in the columns are stickers with your assignments. Just like in Trello.
